name: Military Tech Startup
description: Complete project plan for military-focused tech products like verified rideshare platforms

issues.title: Set up authentication system with CAC/PIV support
issues.body:
## Description
Implement multi-factor authentication system supporting CAC/PIV cards for military verification.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] CAC/PIV card reader integration
- [ ] Fallback authentication methods
- [ ] Session management
- [ ] Security token handling

## Technical Notes
- Use military-grade encryption
- Implement OAuth 2.0 flow
- Support DoD PKI certificates

issues.title: Create user profile system with military verification
issues.body:
## Description
Build user profile management with military service verification.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Profile creation and editing
- [ ] Military branch selection
- [ ] Rank verification
- [ ] Base assignment
- [ ] Profile photo upload

## Technical Notes
- Store sensitive data encrypted
- Implement verification workflow

issues.title: Build ride request/offer creation interface
issues.body:
## Description
Create UI for posting and browsing rides.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Ride posting form
- [ ] Date/time picker
- [ ] Location autocomplete
- [ ] Seat capacity selector
- [ ] Cost sharing options

## Technical Notes
- Mobile-responsive design
- Real-time validation

issues.title: Implement real-time matching algorithm
issues.body:
## Description
Develop algorithm to match riders with drivers based on routes and timing.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Route matching logic
- [ ] Time window matching
- [ ] Distance calculations
- [ ] Preference matching
- [ ] Real-time updates

## Technical Notes
- Use geospatial indexing
- Optimize for low latency

issues.title: Create messaging system for ride coordination
issues.body:
## Description
Build in-app messaging for coordinating ride details.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Real-time chat
- [ ] Message notifications
- [ ] Read receipts
- [ ] File sharing (limited)
- [ ] Message encryption

## Technical Notes
- WebSocket for real-time
- End-to-end encryption option

issues.title: Develop payment/cost-sharing integration
issues.body:
## Description
Integrate payment system for ride cost sharing.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Payment method storage
- [ ] Cost calculation
- [ ] Split payment logic
- [ ] Transaction history
- [ ] Refund handling

## Technical Notes
- PCI compliance required
- Use established payment gateway

issues.title: Implement DoD security compliance measures
issues.body:
## Description
Ensure platform meets DoD security requirements.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] NIST compliance audit
- [ ] Security scanning implementation
- [ ] Vulnerability assessment
- [ ] Incident response plan
- [ ] Security documentation

## Technical Notes
- Follow DISA STIG guidelines
- Implement security headers

issues.title: Add background check integration
issues.body:
## Description
Integrate with military background check systems.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] DEERS integration
- [ ] Clearance level verification
- [ ] Automated checks
- [ ] Status updates
- [ ] Privacy compliance

## Technical Notes
- Secure API integration
- Handle classified information properly

issues.title: Implement data encryption at rest and in transit
issues.body:
## Description
Ensure all sensitive data is properly encrypted.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Database encryption
- [ ] TLS 1.3 minimum
- [ ] Key management system
- [ ] Encryption audit logs
- [ ] Compliance verification

## Technical Notes
- Use AES-256 encryption
- Implement key rotation

issues.title: Create audit logging system
issues.body:
## Description
Implement comprehensive activity logging for security audits.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All actions logged
- [ ] Tamper-proof logs
- [ ] Log retention policy
- [ ] Export capabilities
- [ ] Real-time monitoring

## Technical Notes
- Centralized logging
- SIEM integration ready

issues.title: Build admin dashboard for security monitoring
issues.body:
## Description
Create administrative interface for monitoring platform security.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Real-time security alerts
- [ ] User activity monitoring
- [ ] Suspicious pattern detection
- [ ] Quick response actions
- [ ] Reporting dashboard

## Technical Notes
- Role-based access control
- Secure admin authentication

issues.title: Add recurring ride scheduling
issues.body:
## Description
Allow users to set up recurring rides (e.g., daily commutes to base).

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Recurring schedule creation
- [ ] Automatic matching
- [ ] Schedule modifications
- [ ] Cancellation handling
- [ ] Notification system

## Technical Notes
- Cron-based scheduling
- Handle schedule conflicts

issues.title: Implement rating and review system
issues.body:
## Description
Build reputation system for drivers and riders.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Star rating system
- [ ] Written reviews
- [ ] Response to reviews
- [ ] Rating calculations
- [ ] Moderation tools

## Technical Notes
- Prevent review manipulation
- Privacy-aware display

issues.title: Create route optimization with multiple stops
issues.body:
## Description
Optimize routes when picking up multiple riders.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Multi-stop routing
- [ ] Time estimates
- [ ] Cost adjustments
- [ ] Visual route display
- [ ] Alternative routes

## Technical Notes
- Use routing API
- Traffic consideration

issues.title: Add emergency contact and safety features
issues.body:
## Description
Implement safety features for ride participants.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Emergency contacts
- [ ] Share trip details
- [ ] Safety check-ins
- [ ] Emergency button
- [ ] Location sharing

## Technical Notes
- GPS tracking
- Quick emergency response

issues.title: Build analytics dashboard for users
issues.body:
## Description
Show users their ride statistics and savings.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Ride history
- [ ] Cost savings calculator
- [ ] Carbon footprint reduction
- [ ] Personal statistics
- [ ] Export data

## Technical Notes
- Data visualization
- Privacy controls

issues.title: Complete comprehensive testing suite
issues.body:
## Description
Develop and execute full testing coverage.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Unit tests (90%+ coverage)
- [ ] Integration tests
- [ ] E2E tests
- [ ] Security testing
- [ ] Performance testing
- [ ] Load testing

## Technical Notes
- Automated test pipeline
- Security scan integration

issues.title: Create user documentation and guides
issues.body:
## Description
Write comprehensive user documentation.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] User manual
- [ ] Video tutorials
- [ ] FAQ section
- [ ] Troubleshooting guide
- [ ] Safety guidelines

## Technical Notes
- Multiple formats
- Accessible design

issues.title: Set up monitoring and alerting
issues.body:
## Description
Implement production monitoring and alerting systems.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Application monitoring
- [ ] Error tracking
- [ ] Performance metrics
- [ ] Uptime monitoring
- [ ] Alert configuration

## Technical Notes
- Use monitoring tools
- Set SLA thresholds

issues.title: Prepare deployment and rollout plan
issues.body:
## Description
Create detailed deployment strategy.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Deployment checklist
- [ ] Rollback procedures
- [ ] Phased rollout plan
- [ ] Success metrics
- [ ] Communication plan

## Technical Notes
- Blue-green deployment
- Gradual rollout strategy

issues.title: Conduct security audit and penetration testing
issues.body:
## Description
Perform thorough security assessment before launch.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Third-party security audit
- [ ] Penetration testing
- [ ] Vulnerability remediation
- [ ] Security certification
- [ ] Compliance verification

## Technical Notes
- Use certified auditors
- Document all findings

issues.title: Set up customer support system
issues.body:

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Knowledge base

## Technical Notes

issues.body:
## Description
Develop marketing content for platform launch.

## Acceptance Criteria
